title: Fascia iliaca compartment block mitigates the fluctuations in heart rate variability and reduces pain with opioid consumption in elderly individuals with hip fractures: A randomized controlled trial
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Xiaoqi Dai, Dongxue Xing, Juan Luo, Yi Yang, Jiayuan Zhai, Tianwei Tang, Wanchao Yang
